## PortalFactory type

Portal factory type - renders children into a target element

Takes an optional target (element, getter, or signal) and a child RefSpec. The child is rendered into the target element.

Generic over: - TBaseElement: The base element type from renderer config

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PortalFactory<TBaseElement> = ServiceDefinition<'portal', {
    <TElement extends TBaseElement>(target?: PortalTarget<TElement>): (child: RefSpec<TElement>) => RefSpec<TElement>;
}>;
```
**References:** [ServiceDefinition](../lattice/servicedefinition/)<!-- -->, [PortalTarget](./portaltarget/)<!-- -->, [RefSpec](./refspec/)
